text:
@atrupar @JohnBarrowman @RepGrothman Has anyone checked his temperature? Or given him a Covid-19 test?

I'm guessing that in a few days we will learn he has tested positive for Covid-19 and knew he was sick when he attended this rally. But just didn't care because he wants you to believe it's just a big hoax.
